headline: Barings and Apollo Affiliates Provide $113 Million Debt Package for Westin Indianapolis
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. - Barings, one of the world's largest diversified real estate investment managers, announced today that it has jointly originated a $113 million debt package alongside affiliates of...
